Record.ParentTerm: Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor
Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Enzyme Inhibitor/Protein Kinase Inhibitor/Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor/Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor/PF-00299804
Record.BroaderTerm: Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor
Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A highly selective, orally bioavailable small-molecule inhibitor of the HER family of tyrosine kinases with potential antineoplastic activity. PF-00299804 specifically and irreversibly binds to and inhibits human Her-1, Her-2, and Her-4, resulting in the proliferation inhibition and apoptosis of tumor cells that overexpress these receptors.
